item.title: Histograms
item.description: Histograms are very complicated to learn for me library(sqldf) library(Lahman) library(ggplot2) # extracting the data------ query<-"SELECT yearID, HR FROM Batting WHERE playerID='ruthba01'" result<-sqldf(query) # visulizing the data----- ggplot()+ #geom_point(data=result,aes(x=yearID,y=HR))+ geom_line(data=result,aes(x=yearID,y=HR))+ ggtitle("Ruth's Homerun Total's Throughout the Year's")+ xlab("year")+ ylab("homeruns")
